title: Lebanon Money Supply M0
description: Money Supply M0 in Lebanon increased to 54484.40 LBP Billion in September from 38367.10 LBP Billion in August of 2022. Money Supply M0 in Lebanon averaged 3361.67 LBP Billion from 1975 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 54484.40 LBP Billion in September of 2022 and a record low of 2.24 LBP Billion in December of 1975. Lebanon Money Supply M0 is the most liquid measure of the money supply including coins and notes in circulation and other assets that are easily convertible into cash. Money Supply M0 and M1, are also known as narrow money. This page provides - Lebanon Money Supply M0 - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Banque Du Liban
